scripts.dev: node scripts/dev/ensure-local-env.mjs && node scripts/dev/preflight-local-dev.mjs && turbo run dev --parallel --filter=@compass/api --filter=@compass/web
scripts.dev:all: node scripts/dev/ensure-local-env.mjs && node scripts/dev/preflight-local-dev.mjs && turbo run dev --parallel
scripts.db:postgres:up: node scripts/dev/ensure-local-env.mjs && docker compose --env-file db/postgres/.env -f db/postgres/docker-compose.yml up -d postgres && pnpm db:postgres:wait && pnpm db:migrate:up && pnpm db:seed
scripts.db:postgres:down: node scripts/dev/ensure-local-env.mjs && docker compose --env-file db/postgres/.env -f db/postgres/docker-compose.yml down
scripts.db:postgres:reset: node scripts/dev/ensure-local-env.mjs && docker compose --env-file db/postgres/.env -f db/postgres/docker-compose.yml down --volumes && pnpm db:postgres:up
scripts.db:postgres:logs: node scripts/dev/ensure-local-env.mjs && docker compose --env-file db/postgres/.env -f db/postgres/docker-compose.yml logs -f postgres
scripts.test:quick: pnpm ci:high-risk-mainline-policy && pnpm ci:testing-policy && pnpm ci:web-constitution-policy && pnpm ci:codex-protocol-policy && pnpm ci:terminology-policy && pnpm ci:service-bus-auth-contract && pnpm db:migrate:check && pnpm format:check && pnpm lint && pnpm typecheck:refs && pnpm typecheck && pnpm test:unit && pnpm contract:check
scripts.test:unit: pnpm turbo run test --ui=stream --log-order=grouped -- --silent=passed-only --reporter=dot && pnpm test:pipeline-contract
scripts.test:contracts: pnpm --filter @compass/contracts test && pnpm --filter @compass/sdk test && pnpm contract:check
scripts.test:runtime:unit: pnpm --filter @compass/api test && pnpm --filter @compass/web test && pnpm --filter @compass/worker test && pnpm --filter @compass/contracts test && pnpm --filter @compass/sdk test
scripts.test:runtime:smoke: pnpm ci:smoke:system && pnpm test:acceptance:system && pnpm test:e2e
scripts.test:coverage: pnpm --filter @compass/api exec vitest run --config vitest.config.mts --coverage && pnpm --filter @compass/web exec vitest run --config vitest.config.mts --coverage && pnpm --filter @compass/worker exec vitest run --config vitest.config.mts --coverage && pnpm --filter @compass/contracts exec vitest run --config vitest.config.mts --coverage && pnpm --filter @compass/sdk exec vitest run --config vitest.config.mts --coverage
scripts.test:e2e: node scripts/dev/ensure-local-env.mjs && playwright test tests/e2e/smoke.spec.ts --config tests/e2e/playwright.config.ts --reporter=line --workers=1
scripts.test:full: node scripts/dev/test-full-preflight.mjs && pnpm test:quick && pnpm test:integration && pnpm test:e2e
scripts.test:acceptance:browser: node scripts/dev/ensure-local-env.mjs && playwright test tests/e2e/smoke.spec.ts --config tests/e2e/playwright.config.ts --reporter=line --workers=1
scripts.contract:check: pnpm contract:generate && git diff --exit-code -- packages/contracts/openapi/openapi.json packages/sdk/src/generated/schema.ts
scripts.git-hooks:install: git rev-parse --is-inside-work-tree >/dev/null 2>&1 || exit 0; if git config --worktree core.hooksPath .githooks 2>/dev/null; then git config --local --unset-all core.hooksPath >/dev/null 2>&1 || true; else git config core.hooksPath .githooks; fi
scripts.test:pipeline-contract: vitest run db/scripts/migration-policy-lib.test.mjs db/scripts/constants.test.mjs db/scripts/initial-schema-migration.test.mjs db/scripts/agent-runtime-groundwork-migration.test.mjs db/scripts/personal-workspace-model-migration.test.mjs db/scripts/organization-workspace-reset-migration.test.mjs db/scripts/auth-audit-events-org-fk-migration.test.mjs scripts/dev/ensure-local-env.test.mjs scripts/dev/test-full-preflight.test.mjs scripts/pipeline/commit/check-format.test.mjs scripts/pipeline/shared/pipeline-utils.test.mjs scripts/pipeline/shared/decide-release-outcome-lib.test.mjs scripts/pipeline/commit/resolve-scope-lib.test.mjs scripts/pipeline/commit/decide-commit-stage-lib.test.mjs scripts/pipeline/commit/decide-integration-gate-lib.test.mjs scripts/pipeline/commit/auto-recover-main.test.mjs scripts/pipeline/commit/testing-policy.test.mjs scripts/pipeline/commit/check-testing-policy.test.mjs scripts/pipeline/commit/check-high-risk-mainline-policy.test.mjs scripts/pipeline/commit/check-auth-openapi-metadata.test.mjs scripts/pipeline/commit/runtime-coverage-lib.test.mjs scripts/pipeline/commit/eslint-policy.test.mjs scripts/pipeline/shared/workflow-pipeline-contract.test.mjs scripts/pipeline/cloud/deployment-stage/apply-infra.test.mjs scripts/pipeline/cloud/deployment-stage/entra-config-wiring.test.mjs scripts/pipeline/cloud/deployment-stage/verify-api-smoke.test.mjs --silent=passed-only --reporter=dot
